verbs.description: it official [V: gargling] [ARG1: with salt water] actually works although most people believe this is an effective way to maintain oral health particularly when gums are injured there has been an absence of actual evidence to suggest this does anything other than offer a brief sensation of relief which admittedly may be enough but last week science finally caught up with grandma water public health fever
